column4: err, so winxp on vmware cant handle hardware like usb devices?
works for me. if i have vmware up when i plug in a usb thing, it takes control instead of linux
awesome, maybe now I can get rid of windows partition for good
does usb devices that dont work on ubuntu, work on winxp @ vmware ?
afaik vmware just takes control totally, so it is exactly as if windows was using it directly
